answers.answer: well glad to hear your angel is doing good still and maybe they will make you more comfiortable soon....good luck and glad to hear from you...
Glad to hear all is Ok. I hate doing the 24hr. pee pee test! Sounds like they are keeping a good eye on you! How week are you? I was induce at 38weeks because my B/P keep going up as well........
i will be 34 wks tomorrow, i am just really happy that i got to see a new specialist today and he actually listened to me and is concerned about me the others just didnt seem interested.
Well, thats great! I Love my specialist as well, he really understands,you know?
at least u and the baby are doing well for the most part!!! thats always good to hear

I dont really like complaing when there is others worse than me, but it just sometimes gets me a little down especially when i wasnt getting any help, but now i know i am getting it.At least i know we will be getting looked after more.
When you did your 24hr urine test did it show much protein ?, and what was the highest that your b/p went to.
Joshuawatkin-I heard that having high blood pressure and protien in the urine are prime symptoms of preeclampsia. Did they do any tests as far as that goes?

With my 1st son I had to do one over the weekend and drop it off to them on sunday. I had a dr. appt on that monday Monday, and never found out how high it was because we induce that night. My b/p with him was always a little high, but they just passed it off as me being scared of the Dr. office....But after it getting higher and higher was induce.....With this pregnancy and Had one done very early on just to see where my levels were at, I never asked about them..... thinking all is Ok. But my b/p with this one has always been high. most of the time its around 130/80 136/78 But the highest was about 148/80. My specailist says not to worrie unless it gets higher then 160/??
Congratulations , hope all goes well for you xx
I have had lots of blood tests especially for preeclampsia but they have come back clear. I also have no swelling which is one of the signs.

joshuawatkin-Here is a link that gives some examples of why there can be protien in your urine. I dont know if it will help, but I did my best *hugs*http://www.m a r c h o f d i m e s.com/pnhec/159_519.asp
Thankyou very much. I have just been looking at high b/p on the internet.
Good luck to you & the baby. I'm happy you all doing good for the most part.
I would just like to thank all you wonderful ladies for your kind words x and i will keep you posted.
good luck sweety i hope it all works out for the best you've done a great job so far
thanks hun x    hope you are well too x

question: Well if you have read any of my posts before you will know that i havnt had a very good pregnancy so far, with the bleedings i had, and now with the high amount of protein in my urine. Well the urine problem as been going on for weeks now and doctors, specialists and midwifes dont know what is happening, i have done 3 24hr urine tests now and they are all showing very high levels of protein for a pregnant lady.Yesterday i went to the ante natal day unit to have some more blood tests done and they have come back clear, the little one was monitored and she is doing fine and then the midwife did my blood pressure and it had droped to 100/50 from the usual 125/75. I have been to the hospital again today to see a new specialist and he was very nice he checked me over and baby seemed to be doing very well again, but when he did my blood pressure it had risen to 136/86. I have to start and go to the ante natal day unit for intense monitoring twice a week 9am-6pm and if my bp doesnt go down they are finally going to induce me (thank god) you never know i may be holding my little girl in a couple of weeks. Sorry its so long.
title: UPDATE ON ME IF ANYONE IS INTERESTED.
